# UITextDropProposal.ProgressMode.custom

**Case**

A text drop progress mode that indicates that you will provide custom progress indicator during the loading of dropped items.

## Declaration

```swift
case custom
```

## Progress modes

- **UITextDropProposal.ProgressMode.system**: A text drop progress mode indicating that the system will show the progress indicator.

items.description: A text drop progress mode indicating that the system will show the progress indicator.
